page.title: 10 Daily lives
page.content: We wanted to find out the differences between the life of a {holiday maker}and a{Westoner.}First of all we spoke to{Mrs. Conybear, Christopher's mother, who works at Daucey's hotel. {Mrs conybear}has to get up in the morning at 7 o'clock and goes straight to the hotel to tidy up the rooms that the people stay in. She has got twelve rooms to tidy. She is a chamber maid. Sometimes she gets back very late. She said it is very hard work but she said she likes working in the hotel and enjoys it very much.That is how Mrs Conybear spends her day. Next we went to ask a{holiday maker how she spent her day. The holiday maker rests during the day.Sometimes she visits things like Birnbeck Pier and gift shops. Sometimes she goes to the beach and enjoys the sun and
